VPCData module

class src.VPCData.VPCData(data=None)[source]

Bases: UserList

This is a class to handle virtual patient data. Basically just a list atm.

Parameters:

UserList (class) – wrapper around list objects

__init__(data=None)[source]

Constructor method

Parameters:

data (list, optional) – patient data read from the input files or generated virtual patient data, defaults to None

append(next)[source]

appends a given list or value to the data list

Parameters:

next (any) – input list or value to be appended to the objects data

index(item, *args)[source]

returns the index of a given element in the data list

Parameters:

item (float) – element of the objects data list

Raises:

ValueError – input element has to be in the objects data list

Returns:

index of the given element

Return type:

int

insert(idx, value)[source]

inserts a given list or value at the desired index in the data list

Parameters:

  • idx (int) – index in the data list of the object

  • value (any) – given list or value to be inserted

remove(value)[source]

deletes the given value from the data list

Parameters:

value (float) – value in the data list to be deleted

Raises:

ValueError – given value has to be in the objects data list
